Invoices

Create and manage invoices programmatically. When you send an invoice, Soledgic automatically creates the accounts receivable entry. When you record payments, it updates AR and Cash accounts with proper double-entry bookkeeping.

Available Endpoints

MethodEndpointDescription
GET/invoicesList all invoices
POST/invoicesCreate a new invoice
GET/invoices/:idGet invoice details
POST/invoices/:id/sendSend invoice & create AR entry
POST/invoices/:id/record-paymentRecord payment on invoice
POST/invoices/:id/voidVoid an unpaid invoice

Create Invoice

Create a new invoice in draft status. Invoices in draft don't affect your books until you send them.

Request Body

FieldTypeRequiredDescription
customer_namestringYesCustomer's name
customer_emailstringNoEmail for sending invoice
customer_idstringNoYour internal customer ID
line_itemsarrayYesArray of line items (see below)
due_datestringNoDue date (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to 30 days.
notesstringNoNotes to display on invoice
termsstringNoPayment terms (e.g., "Net 30")

Line Item Fields

FieldTypeDescription
descriptionstringDescription of the item/service
quantitynumberQuantity (must be positive)
unit_priceintegerPrice per unit in cents

Example Request

curl -X POST "https://api.soledgic.com/invoices" \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "customer_name": "Acme Corporation",
    "customer_email": "billing@acme.com",
    "customer_id": "cust_acme_001",
    "line_items": [
      {
        "description": "Monthly SaaS Subscription - Pro Plan",
        "quantity": 1,
        "unit_price": 9900
      },
      {
        "description": "Additional API Calls (50,000)",
        "quantity": 50,
        "unit_price": 100
      }
    ],
    "due_date": "2026-01-31",
    "notes": "Thank you for your business!",
    "terms": "Net 30"
  }'

Example Response

{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "inv_abc123xyz",
    "invoice_number": "INV-2412-K7XZ",
    "customer_name": "Acme Corporation",
    "customer_email": "billing@acme.com",
    "line_items": [
      {
        "description": "Monthly SaaS Subscription - Pro Plan",
        "quantity": 1,
        "unit_price": 9900,
        "amount": 9900
      },
      {
        "description": "Additional API Calls (50,000)",
        "quantity": 50,
        "unit_price": 100,
        "amount": 5000
      }
    ],
    "subtotal": 14900,
    "tax_amount": 0,
    "total_amount": 14900,
    "amount_paid": 0,
    "amount_due": 14900,
    "currency": "USD",
    "status": "draft",
    "issue_date": "2025-12-23",
    "due_date": "2026-01-31",
    "created_at": "2025-12-23T10:30:00Z"
  }
}

Send Invoice

Sending an invoice changes its status from "draft" to "sent" and creates the double-entry bookkeeping entries: Debit Accounts Receivable, Credit Revenue.

Example Request

curl -X POST "https://api.soledgic.com/invoices/inv_abc123xyz/send" \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY"

Example Response

{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Invoice sent and AR entry created",
  "data": {
    "id": "inv_abc123xyz",
    "invoice_number": "INV-2412-K7XZ",
    "status": "sent",
    "sent_at": "2025-12-23T10:35:00Z",
    "transaction_id": "txn_def456"
  }
}

Accounting Impact: When you send an invoice, Soledgic automatically creates a transaction with entries that debit Accounts Receivable and credit Revenue. This follows proper accrual accounting principles.

Record Payment

Record a payment against an invoice. Creates entries: Debit Cash, Credit Accounts Receivable. Supports partial payments—the invoice status will be "partial" until fully paid.

Request Body

FieldTypeDescription
amountintegerPayment amount in cents (required)
payment_methodstringe.g., "bank_transfer", "credit_card", "check"
reference_idstringCheck number, transaction ID, etc.

Example Request

curl -X POST "https://api.soledgic.com/invoices/inv_abc123xyz/record-payment" \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "amount": 14900,
    "payment_method": "bank_transfer",
    "reference_id": "CHK-12345"
  }'

Example Response

{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Payment of $149.00 recorded",
  "data": {
    "invoice": {
      "id": "inv_abc123xyz",
      "status": "paid",
      "amount_paid": 14900,
      "amount_due": 0,
      "paid_at": "2025-12-23T14:00:00Z"
    },
    "payment_transaction_id": "txn_ghi789"
  }
}

List Invoices

Retrieve a paginated list of invoices with optional filtering by status and customer.

Query Parameters

ParameterTypeDescription
statusstringFilter by status: draft, sent, partial, paid, overdue, void
customer_idstringFilter by customer ID
limitintegerNumber of results (max 100, default 50)
offsetintegerPagination offset

Example Request

curl -X GET "https://api.soledgic.com/invoices?status=sent&limit=10" \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY"

Invoice Statuses

draft

Created but not sent. No AR entry yet.

sent

Sent to customer. AR entry created.

partial

Some payment received, balance remaining.

paid

Fully paid. AR balance is zero.

overdue

Past due date with balance remaining.

void

Cancelled. AR entry reversed if sent.

Related Endpoints

GET /ar-agingGET /balance-sheetGET /profit-loss
